name: Moon
description: The Moon is Earth's only natural satellite. It has a rocky surface covered with craters and flat plains. It influences Earth's tides and has a synchronous rotation, meaning the same side always faces Earth. It has no atmosphere, leading to extreme temperature variations.

name: Phobos
description: Phobos is the larger and closer of Mars' two moons. It is irregularly shaped and heavily cratered. Phobos orbits Mars very quickly, completing one orbit in about 7.6 hours. It is slowly spiraling inward and may eventually break apart or crash into Mars.

name: Deimos
description: Deimos is the smaller and more distant of Mars' two moons. It has a smoother and less cratered surface compared to Phobos. Deimos orbits Mars in about 30.3 hours and is thought to be a captured asteroid.
